K12D0767_H0707:1b-0: @1b #// gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje bsnams pa la phyag
K12D0767_H0707:1b-1: 'tshal lo; ;de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen
K12D0767_H0707:1b-2: po yang dag shes kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan
K12D0767_H0707:1b-3: du mar ba skor ba byas nas lha'i me tog
K12D0767_H0707:1b-4: dang / rin po che du mas bcom ldan 'das
K12D0767_H0707:1b-5: la mngon par bstod nas 'di skad ces gsol to
K12D0767_H0707:2a-2: lha rnams kyi rgyal po 'di la ci'i slad du rnam thos sras zhes bgyi /
K12D0767_H0707:2a-3: ci'i slad du ngal bso po zhes bgyi /
K12D0767_H0707:2a-4: ci'i slad du gnas srung po zhes bgyi /
K12D0767_H0707:2a-5: ci'i slad du lus ngan po zhes bgyi /
K12D0767_H0707:2a-6: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K12D0767_H0707:2a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa /
K12D0767_H0707:2a-9: khyod kyis lha'i rgyal po'i ming gi rnam grangs rnams gnod sbyin gyi tshogs chen po 'di dang /
K12D0767_H0707:2b-0: sde dpon chen po yang dag shes la yang dag par ston cig ces pa de @2b gsungs nas /
K12D0767_H0707:2b-1: de nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes
K12D0767_H0707:2b-2: bcom ldan 'das la lan du mar bskor ba byas
K12D0767_H0707:2b-3: nas rdo rje snyems pa dang bcas pas 'gying zhing
K12D0767_H0707:2b-4: rang gi stan la 'dug ste 'khor 'dus pa dang
K12D0767_H0707:2b-5: / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnams la
K12D0767_H0707:2b-6: gzigs nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang
K12D0767_H0707:2b-7: dag shes la 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12D0767_H0707:2b-9: lha'i rgyal po 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad de
K12D0767_H0707:2b-10: bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs las sprul pa ste; sangs rgyas
K12D0767_H0707:2b-11: kyi mdzad pa ji lta ba bzhin du mdzad pa'o
K12D0767_H0707:2b-12: // de nas tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis bsams pa /
K12D0767_H0707:2b-13: kye ma lha rnams kyi srid grub cing mi rnams
K12D0767_H0707:2b-14: kyi re ba skong ba'i phyir thabs ci yod ces
K12D0767_H0707:3a-1: cad kyi mnga' bdag ma h'a de ba drang srong
K12D0767_H0707:3a-2: gi spyod pa la gnas shing dga' ba'i tshal na
K12D0767_H0707:3a-3: yod pa; lha'i bu rnams kyis drang srong chen po
K12D0767_H0707:3a-4: rnam pa mang du thos pa drang srong gi spyod
K12D0767_H0707:3a-5: pa mdzad do zhes grags so //
K12D0767_H0707:3a-6: de'i tshe na tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis brgya byin la bskul te /
K12D0767_H0707:3a-7: dpal lha mo drang srong la phul lo //
K12D0767_H0707:3a-8: des kyang drang srong gi dka' thub bzlog go /
K12D0767_H0707:3a-9: rnam pa mang po thos pa dang lhan cig tu gnas pa las /
K12D0767_H0707:3a-10: zla ba bcu na khye'u mtshan dang ldan pa zhig dpal lha mo'i pang du brdzus te byung ngo //
K12D0767_H0707:3a-11: ming yang srid grub ces btags so //
K12D0767_H0707:3a-12: de nas cher skyes pa dang /
K12D0767_H0707:3a-13: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis lcang lo can gyi pho brang du phul te /
K12D0767_H0707:3b-0: sa gsum pa'i rgyal @3b por dbang bskur ro //
K12D0767_H0707:3b-1: de'i tshe bar snang la gnas pa'i lha rnams dang /
K12D0767_H0707:3b-5: gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la sogs pa rnams
K12D0767_H0707:3b-6: kyis rin po che'i shing rta bkra ba phul nas
K12D0767_H0707:3b-7: bstod pa / lha dang mi yi mgon gyur lha yi lha //
K12D0767_H0707:3b-8: bde mdzad srid grub rnam mang thos pa'i sras //
K12D0767_H0707:3b-9: smon lam thugs rje'i mthu mnga' rin chen mang //
K12D0767_H0707:3b-10: rnam mang thos pa'i sras la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0767_H0707:3b-11: zhes bstod de phyag 'tshal ba las rnam thos sras zhes ming du chags par gyur to //
K12D0767_H0707:3b-12: sde dpon chen po yang dag shes /
K12D0767_H0707:3b-13: lha rnams ni lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams 'dod la /
K12D0767_H0707:3b-14: lha ma yin rnams ni lha rnams kyi shing thog 'dod pas na de dag 'thab par byed do //
K12D0767_H0707:3b-15: de'ang lha ma yin rnams la ri rab kyi khong seng nas gzhi chen po bzhi gnas te /
K12D0767_H0707:3b-19: bzhi pa thags bzangs ris so //
K12D0767_H0707:3b-20: de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan
K12D0767_H0707:3b-21: dpung gi tshogs chen po dang chas te rgyal chen
K12D0767_H0707:3b-22: rigs bzhi'i lha rnams la brgal bar gyur to //
K12D0767_H0707:3b-23: de'i tshe na rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu ngal
K12D0767_H0707:3b-24: bso ste 'dzam bu'i gling lta zhing rab tu rtogs
K12D0767_H0707:4a-3: mig mi bzang rnams dang 'thab par byed do //
K12D0767_H0707:4a-4: de'i tshe na rnam thos sras ri rab kyi rked
K12D0767_H0707:4a-5: pa la ngal bso ba sgra gcan gyis mthong nas
K12D0767_H0707:4a-6: gzi brjid dang / dpal ma bzod de /
K12D0767_H0707:4a-7: de'i tshe na sgra gcan gyis rin po che'i me
K12D0767_H0707:4a-8: tog sna tshogs rnams kyis gtor te bstod pas lha
K12D0767_H0707:4a-9: yi nang na nor lha lha yi mchog /
K12D0767_H0707:4a-10: 'gro ba'i skyabs mdzad ngal bso dge ba po //
K12D0767_H0707:4a-11: bde gshegs spyod mdzad re ba skong mdzad pa'i //
K12D0767_H0707:4a-12: kun gyi mgon gyur ngal bso khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12D0767_H0707:4a-13: zhes bstod nas sa gsum gyi rgyal po ngal bso
K12D0767_H0707:4a-14: brgyal bar gyur cig ces bstod nas rang gi gnas
K12D0767_H0707:4a-15: su zhugs so // yang dag shes des na ngal bso po zhes ming du chags par gyur to //
K12D0767_H0707:4a-16: sde dpon chen po yang dag shes de nas lha
K12D0767_H0707:4a-17: ma yin gyi sa gnyis pa la gnas pa mgul
K12D0767_H0707:4a-18: phreng gis sgra gcan la smras pa /
K12D0767_H0707:4a-20: khyod g-yul las brtan pa thob bam /
K12D0767_H0707:4a-21: bde bar log gam zhes dris pa dang /
K12D0767_H0707:4a-23: kho bo ni ngal bso po rgyal po'i gzi brjid kyis bsregs so //
K12D0767_H0707:4a-24: rnam par tshig ste bzod par dka'o zhes smras so //
K12D0767_H0707:4b-0: de'i tshe mgul phreng khro bas non nas @4b sgra gcan la smras pa /
K12D0767_H0707:4b-3: dmag gi dpung khyod pas bzhi 'gyur gyis mang bas /
K12D0767_H0707:4b-4: 'u bu cag 'grogs te rgyal chen bzhi'i grong dang /
K12D0767_H0707:4b-5: skyed yos tshal kun dga' ra ba rnams gzhom par
K12D0767_H0707:4b-6: bya'o zhes nas dpung gi tshogs dpag tu med pa
K12D0767_H0707:4b-7: dang / sgra gcan dang bcas te 'ongs par gyur to /
K12D0767_H0707:4b-8: de'i tshe rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu seng+ge la
K12D0767_H0707:4b-9: zhon par gyur cing gser gyi ya lad bgos te
K12D0767_H0707:4b-10: gnas pa las rgyal po gsum dang /
K12D0767_H0707:4b-11: lcang lo can rnams phrogs la thug pa'i tshe rnam thos nyid kyi yul dang /
K12D0767_H0707:4b-12: kun dga' ra ba la sogs pa'i gnas rnams bsrungs te lha ma yin rnams pham par byas so //
K12D0767_H0707:4b-13: de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang po mgul phreng
K12D0767_H0707:4b-14: gis gos rin po che sna tshogs kyis gtor nas
K12D0767_H0707:4b-15: bstod pa / dpa' bo 'jigs med nyon mongs g-yul las rgyal //
K12D0767_H0707:4b-16: lha rnams gnas srung zil gnon seng+ge'i gdan //
K12D0767_H0707:4b-17: phongs pa sgrol mdzad ya lad rnam lngas brgyan //
K12D0767_H0707:4b-18: mgon po gnas srung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0767_H0707:4b-19: zhes bstod nas rang gi gnas su zhugs par gyur to //
K12D0767_H0707:4b-20: de nas lha ma yin sa gzhi gsum la gnas
K12D0767_H0707:4b-21: pa'i rab dgod ces bya bas mgul phreng la smras
K12D0767_H0707:5a-0: pa / lha ma yin gyi dbang po g-yul las rgyal @5a *//
K12D0767_H0707:5a-2: brtan pa thob bam zhes dris pa dang /
K12D0767_H0707:5a-4: lha ma yin gyi bdag po /
K12D0767_H0707:5a-5: kho bo cag sgra gcan dang bcas pa mgon po
K12D0767_H0707:5a-6: gnas bsrungs pos shin tu'ang pham par byas te chu
K12D0767_H0707:5a-7: shing gi tshal bzhin du 'dar bar byas so //
K12D0767_H0707:5a-8: me tog la ba mo phog pa ltar brnyings par byas so zhes smras pa dang /
K12D0767_H0707:5a-10: kho bos lha'i dbang po'i grong khyer blta na sdug dbrog par bya'o //
K12D0767_H0707:5a-11: rgyal chen ris bzhi pa rnams 'bangs su bya'o zhes
K12D0767_H0707:5a-12: smras nas rang gi yul nas dpung gi tshogs chen
K12D0767_H0707:5a-14: mgul phreng dang bcas pa snga ma bas brgya 'gyur
K12D0767_H0707:5a-15: gyis lhag pa ri rab kyi steng du phyin to
K12D0767_H0707:5a-16: // de'i tshe lha'i dbang po ni chos bzang na lha'i bu rnams la chos ston to //
K12D0767_H0707:5a-17: de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi bdag po gsum gyi
K12D0767_H0707:5a-18: dmag dang bcas pas blta na sdug gi grong bar
K12D0767_H0707:5a-19: dang / skyed mos tshal rnams phrogs la thug go /
K12D0767_H0707:5a-20: de'i tshe nye dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgya byin la gsol pa /
K12D0767_H0707:5a-23: lha ma yin rnams kyi blta na sdug pa'i grong khyer phrogs la thug go zhes gsol pa dang /
K12D0767_H0707:5b-0: lha'i bdag po rnams @5b song la byang phyogs kyi
K12D0767_H0707:5b-1: rgyal po ngal bso po la gsol ba thob cig
K12D0767_H0707:5b-2: / des g-yul las rgyal bar byed do zhes smras so //
K12D0767_H0707:5b-3: de nas nye dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis rgyal
K12D0767_H0707:5b-4: po chen po khyod la lha ma yin gyi g-yul
K12D0767_H0707:5b-5: las rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir lha'i dbang po 'bod
K12D0767_H0707:5b-7: de'i tshe rgyal po ngal bso bo ri rab gser
K12D0767_H0707:5b-8: gyi mdog can de steng du gang mdzes snyam pa
K12D0767_H0707:5b-9: dang / bee d'urya mdzes par mthong ste bdag nyid
K12D0767_H0707:5b-10: bee d'urya'i lus su gnas te rta bee d'urya'i mdog
K12D0767_H0707:5b-11: can zhon te gser gyi ya lang kyis brgyad te
K12D0767_H0707:5b-13: de'i tshe rab dgod pa la sogs pas gzi brjid
K12D0767_H0707:5b-14: ma bzod de rang 'pham par gyur nas sa'i sgo
K12D0767_H0707:5b-15: de nyid nas rang gi gnas su song ngo //
K12D0767_H0707:5b-16: de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ngo mtshar skyes te /
K12D0767_H0707:5b-18: lus ngan pa 'di 'dra bas lha ma yin gyi
K12D0767_H0707:5b-19: g-yul las rgyal bar byas so zhes zer ro; ;yang
K12D0767_H0707:5b-20: dag shes / rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha rnams kyi lus kyi tshad ni rgyang grags bzhi cha'o //
K12D0767_H0707:5b-21: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lus kyi tshad ni rgyang grags phyed do //
K12D0767_H0707:5b-22: de ltar ngal bso po'i lus kyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lus kyi phyed las mi sleb bo //
K12D0767_H0707:6a-0: de'i tshe nye dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis rin po che'i me tog du @6a *//
K12D0767_H0707:6a-2: lha yi nang na rgyal po nor lha khyod //
K12D0767_H0707:6a-3: yid bzhin re ba kun gyi skyabs gyur pa //
K12D0767_H0707:6a-4: lus ngan pos ni lha min bye ba btul //
K12D0767_H0707:6a-5: nyon mongs g-yul las rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0767_H0707:6a-6: zhes bstod de rgyal po lus ngan po ni kho
K12D0767_H0707:6a-7: bo cag gi skyabs su gyur to zhes brjod pas
K12D0767_H0707:6a-8: de'i phyir lus ngan po zhes so //
K12D0767_H0707:6a-10: de ltar rgyal po gnas gsum po 'di'i ming gi rnam grangs rnams shes par gyis shig /
K12D0767_H0707:6a-11: gnod sbyin gar mkhan mchog gi brtag pa phyi ma las /
K12D0767_H0707:6a-12: rnam thos sras kyi ming gi rnam grangs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o ////
K12D0767_H0707:6a-13: de nas sde dpon yang dag shes //
K12D0767_H0707:6a-14: rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis ni //
K12D0767_H0707:6a-15: gsang ba'i bdag la 'di skad gsol //
K12D0767_H0707:6a-17: lha rnams dbul ba sel ba yi //
K12D0767_H0707:6a-18: de yi sgrub thabs bshad par mdzod //
K12D0767_H0707:6a-19: de skad gsol ba gsan nas ni //
K12D0767_H0707:6a-20: gsang ba'i bdag po rab bzhang de //
K12D0767_H0707:6a-21: gnod sbyin bdag po dag la gsungs //
K12D0767_H0707:6a-22: legs so sde dpon yang dag shes //
K12D0767_H0707:6a-23: byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mang //
K12D0767_H0707:6a-24: rnam snang dpal phreng thugs las sprul //
K12D0767_H0707:6b-0: de sgrub cho ga 'di lta @6b ste; ;rab tu dben pa'i gnas dag tu //
K12D0767_H0707:6b-1: bde ba'i stan la rab 'dug ste //
K12D0767_H0707:6b-2: khrus byas gos gtsang gyon nas ni //
K12D0767_H0707:6b-3: mchod pa rnams kyis rab mchod la //
K12D0767_H0707:6b-4: snying ga'i phyogs su yi ge h'um//
K12D0767_H0707:6b-5: de las dpag med 'od spros te //
K12D0767_H0707:6b-6: sangs rgyas byang chub sems sogs dang //
K12D0767_H0707:6b-7: nyan thos rang rgyal 'gro ba'i mgon //
K12D0767_H0707:6b-8: de rnams mdun du gsal ba las //
K12D0767_H0707:6b-10: de nas byams sogs rjes dran te //
K12D0767_H0707:6b-11: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes ni //
K12D0767_H0707:6b-12: mi g-yo las byung bde bar 'dug /
K12D0767_H0707:6b-13: de nas smon lam thugs rje yis //
K12D0767_H0707:6b-14: rta bdun steng du 'brug sgra'i dbyangs //
K12D0767_H0707:6b-15: rdo rje rtse lnga de nyid gnas //
K12D0767_H0707:6b-16: de las yongs su rdzogs ba'i sku //
K12D0767_H0707:6b-17: sku mdog ljang ser d'ur ba'i mdog /
K12D0767_H0707:6b-18: sems dpa' 'dzum zhing yid kyang khro //
K12D0767_H0707:6b-19: sgeg par bcas shing rgyan dang ldan //
K12D0767_H0707:6b-20: ye shes ting nge 'dzin gyis mdzes //
K12D0767_H0707:6b-21: mdun du rdo rje gnod mdzes ni; ;sku mdog mthing nag sbrul gyis brgyan //
K12D0767_H0707:6b-22: g-yas pa rdo rje ral gri g-yon //
K12D0767_H0707:6b-23: de nas rig pa stobs po che //
K12D0767_H0707:6b-24: khams gsum 'joms pa sku mdog dmar //
K12D0767_H0707:6b-25: rdo rje dang ni rnga yab phyag /
K12D0767_H0707:6b-26: g-yas kyi phyogs su nye bar gnas //
K12D0767_H0707:6b-27: de yi g-yon gyi phyogs su ni //
K12D0767_H0707:6b-28: khro bo khams gsum bdud las rgyal //
K12D0767_H0707:7a-2: rgyab tu bdud rtsi thab sbyor ni //
K12D0767_H0707:7a-3: ljang khu sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin //
K12D0767_H0707:7a-4: grva dang grva yi phyogs rnams su //
K12D0767_H0707:7a-5: sgeg mo phreng ba gar dang glu //
K12D0767_H0707:7a-6: bdug pa me tog mar me rnams //
K12D0767_H0707:7a-7: khyams dang de yi grva la 'o //
K12D0767_H0707:7a-8: lcags kyu la sogs sgo yi bdag /
K12D0767_H0707:7a-9: ye shes ting nge 'dzin gyis mdzes //
K12D0767_H0707:7a-10: sa bon h'um las yang dag 'byung //
K12D0767_H0707:7a-11: me rlung chu nas nam mkha' la //
K12D0767_H0707:7a-12: yongs su gyur pa'i gzhal yas khang //
K12D0767_H0707:7a-13: ye shes rtsig pa lngas mdzes pa'i //
K12D0767_H0707:7a-14: de yi bdag po sems dpa'i tshul //
K12D0767_H0707:7a-15: bcu drug 'khor gyis rab bskor ba'i //
K12D0767_H0707:7a-16: de yi gsang sngags 'di lta ste //
K12D0767_H0707:7a-17: aom badzra tsanda sarba dushtana ta ka /
K12D0767_H0707:7a-18: ha na da ha pa tsa h'um phat/
K12D0767_H0707:7a-19: aom badzre kro dha sum bha r'a dza h'um/
K12D0767_H0707:7a-20: aom badzra kro dha ha na da ha gupta bi
K12D0767_H0707:7a-21: dhva na sa ya dza ti lam bo dha ra
K12D0767_H0707:7a-22: h'um phat/ aom badzra kro dha tree lo kya bi dza ya h'um phat/
K12D0767_H0707:7a-23: aom badzra kro dha aa mri ta kunda li ha na ha na h'um phat/
K12D0767_H0707:7a-27: aom badzra ni rti a'a: aom badzra dhu pe h'um/
K12D0767_H0707:7a-29: aom badzra a'a lo ke hri:/
K12D0767_H0707:7a-31: aom badzr'a aam ku sha dza:/
K12D0767_H0707:7a-35: de dag rnams kyis mchod byas nas //
K12D0767_H0707:7a-36: 'bum phrag gcig tu yongs bzlas na //
K12D0767_H0707:7b-0: @7b byang chub chen por 'gyur ba ste //
K12D0767_H0707:7b-1: ral gri mig sman rkang mgyogs dang //
K12D0767_H0707:7b-2: ril bu mi snang bcud kyis len //
K12D0767_H0707:7b-3: bum pa bzang dang gser 'gyur dang //
K12D0767_H0707:7b-4: grub pa brgyad na thob gyur te //
K12D0767_H0707:7b-5: lha bran rnams kyang g-yog tu byed //
K12D0767_H0707:7b-6: de la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams //
K12D0767_H0707:7b-8: gnod sbyin gar mkhan mchog gi brtag pa phyi ma las /
K12D0767_H0707:7b-9: bcu bdun pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o ////
K12D0767_H0707:7b-10: sde dpon chen po yang dag shes //
K12D0767_H0707:7b-11: gnas gsum pa yi rgyal po yi //
K12D0767_H0707:7b-12: sgrub pa yang dag rab bshad bya //
K12D0767_H0707:7b-13: rab tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su //
K12D0767_H0707:7b-14: bde ba'i stan la rab 'dug nas //
K12D0767_H0707:7b-15: rang gi snying gar nyi mar h'um//
K12D0767_H0707:7b-17: bla ma sangs rgyas mchod byas bstod //
K12D0767_H0707:7b-18: tshad med bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
K12D0767_H0707:7b-19: stong pa nyid kyis brtan byas te //
K12D0767_H0707:7b-20: tsha zer can du yang dag h'um//
K12D0767_H0707:7b-22: de gyur gsang ba'i bdag po ni //
K12D0767_H0707:7b-23: sku mdog ljang ser yid tsam khro //
K12D0767_H0707:7b-25: sangs rgyas dpag med rab 'phro ba'i //
K12D0767_H0707:7b-26: bdag nyid de ltar bsam par bya //
K12D0767_H0707:7b-27: de nas de yi mdun du ni //
K12D0767_H0707:7b-28: bhrum las byung ba'i gzhal yas khang //
K12D0767_H0707:7b-29: ka ba brgyad khri dag dang ldan //
K12D0767_H0707:7b-30: rin chen bzhi las grub pa yi //
K12D0767_H0707:8a-2: zur bzhi rim brtsegs pho brang dgu //
K12D0767_H0707:8a-3: dbus kyi sa yi cha rnams su //
K12D0767_H0707:8a-4: rdzing bu bzang pos yang dag spras //
K12D0767_H0707:8a-6: bee las skyes pa'i sa gsum bdag /
K12D0767_H0707:8a-7: lha rnams rgyal po bsam par bya //
K12D0767_H0707:8a-8: sngar gyi gtso bo'i thugs ka las //
K12D0767_H0707:8a-10: sku gsum ldan zhing de nyid kyi //
K12D0767_H0707:8a-11: gnas drug rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs //
K12D0767_H0707:8a-12: de la mchod bstod gsol bya zhing //
K12D0767_H0707:8a-13: snying po'i sngags kyis mnyes par bya //
K12D0767_H0707:8a-14: aom badzra p'a ni h'um h'um phat/
K12D0767_H0707:8a-15: aom bee shra pa n'a ye sv'ah'a /
K12D0767_H0707:8a-17: gsal ba gsum dang ldan pa yis //
K12D0767_H0707:8a-18: de nyid rig par mchod byas na //
K12D0767_H0707:8a-19: sa gsum mgon po rab mnyes nas //
K12D0767_H0707:8a-20: 'dod pa'i don rnams sgrub byed cing //
K12D0767_H0707:8a-21: 'bum phrag gcig gis sa rnams g-yo //
K12D0767_H0707:8a-22: ril gnas pa'i gnod sbyin rnams //
K12D0767_H0707:8a-23: bran g-yog rab tu byed pa yin //
K12D0767_H0707:8a-25: bar snang gnas pa'i gnod sbyin rnams //
K12D0767_H0707:8a-26: bran g-yog rab tu byed pa yin //
K12D0767_H0707:8a-27: des ci bsgo ba'i ngag nyan byed //
K12D0767_H0707:8a-28: 'bum phrag gsum gyis phyogs rnams bsreg /
K12D0767_H0707:8b-0: grags pas phyogs bcur rgyas @8b par khyab //
K12D0767_H0707:8b-1: 'bum phrag bzhi yis bza' btung thob //
K12D0767_H0707:8b-2: gnod sbyin lha yi bu mo rnams //
K12D0767_H0707:8b-3: bud med gzugs kyi rig 'dzin mchod //
K12D0767_H0707:8b-4: 'bum phrag lnga yi nor dang ldan //
K12D0767_H0707:8b-5: sa 'og gnas pa'i klu rnams kyis //
K12D0767_H0707:8b-8: chos la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin rnams //
K12D0767_H0707:8b-9: mi yi byis pa'i gzugs su ston //
K12D0767_H0707:8b-11: chos dang ldan pa'i lha rnams ni //
K12D0767_H0707:8b-12: sems can don du skye bar byed //
K12D0767_H0707:8b-14: stobs chen sum cu rtsa gnyis dang //
K12D0767_H0707:8b-15: sde dpon chen po nyi shu brgyad //
K12D0767_H0707:8b-16: de yi rjes 'brang bar chad sel //
K12D0767_H0707:8b-17: dgus ni bcud len sman rnams rnyed //
K12D0767_H0707:8b-18: gnod sbyin rig 'dzin chen po rnams //
K12D0767_H0707:8b-19: de yi stobs dang tshe 'phel phyir //
K12D0767_H0707:8b-20: sman pa'i gzugs su yang dag gnas //
K12D0767_H0707:8b-21: bcus ni mngon par shes pa 'thob //
K12D0767_H0707:8b-22: yon tan kun gyis rab tu gang //
K12D0767_H0707:8b-23: gnod sbyin gar mkhan mchog gi brtag pa phyi ma las /
K12D0767_H0707:8b-24: gdul bya'i phyag na rdo rje'i gsang sngags kyi phan yon bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o ////
K12D0767_H0707:8b-25: sde dpon chen po yang dag shes /
K12D0767_H0707:9a-0: rig pa'i cho ga zab mo 'di bsgrim mi dgos pa las thams @9a *//
K12D0767_H0707:9a-1: cad byed pa ste so shing la sngags shing gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0767_H0707:9a-2: rtsva d'ur ba'i yam shing la 'bras thug po che dang /
K12D0767_H0707:9a-3: gi wang brta dang bsregs na nor 'phel bar byed do //
K12D0767_H0707:9a-4: yi ge brgyad pa'i rig sngags 'di nyid gser gyi byang bu la mngon par bris te zangs dang /
K12D0767_H0707:9a-5: ga'u la sbyor ba byas la sbrang rtsi'i nang du
K12D0767_H0707:9a-6: 'khor lo bcug ste brnga rgyud phyag rgya bcas pa'i
K12D0767_H0707:9a-7: snyim par bcug ste 'bum phrag bcu bzlas na gong
K12D0767_H0707:9a-8: du bstan pa'i yon tan rnams 'byung ste the tshom
K12D0767_H0707:9a-9: mi bya'o // 'khor lo de'i sgrub pa ni gzhan
K12D0767_H0707:9a-10: yang bang mdzod du khang pa gru bzhi shin tu
K12D0767_H0707:9a-11: mi bya'o // mdzes pa / tshon rtsis kha dog bsgyur ba /
K12D0767_H0707:9a-12: tsandan dmar po'i dris khyab par byugs la /
K12D0767_H0707:9a-14: dpangs su khru gsum pa byas te de'i dbus su
K12D0767_H0707:9a-15: bum pa lnga 'bru lngas bkang ba'i steng du bzhag
K12D0767_H0707:9a-16: la zla ba 'ong ngo cog gi tshes bcu'i nyin
K12D0767_H0707:9a-17: par mchod pa bya zhing gsol ba btab na nor
K12D0767_H0707:9a-18: gyi phung po 'phel bar byed de dkor mdzod kyi
K12D0767_H0707:9a-19: sgrub pa ste gter gyi phung po'o //
K12D0767_H0707:9a-20: yang snga ma'i 'khor lo de thab kyi dbus su sna tshogs rdo rje'i steng du bzhag la /
K12D0767_H0707:9b-0: grva bzhir bum pa gang ba'i gzugs @9b bzhi dang /
K12D0767_H0707:9b-1: logs bzhir ba bzhi bri bar bya ste seng ldeng
K12D0767_H0707:9b-2: gi mes skol na g-yos pa mi zad par byed
K12D0767_H0707:9b-3: do // yang 'khor lo de gtsug lag khang du
K12D0767_H0707:9b-4: sbas na gang bsgrubs pa'i gnod sbyin de mngon du
K12D0767_H0707:9b-5: do // 'gyur ro // yang 'khor lo de phyug
K12D0767_H0707:9b-6: po'i bang mdzod du mis ma tshor par sbas na
K12D0767_H0707:9b-7: 'bru'i phung po rang gi gnas su 'pho'o //
K12D0767_H0707:9b-8: yang 'khor lo de btsun mo'i skye gnas su sbas
K12D0767_H0707:9b-9: te brda rgyud kyi phyag bcas pa dpal lha mo'i
K12D0767_H0707:9b-10: mdun du gsol ba btab na gsol ba btab pa'i
K12D0767_H0707:9b-11: rigs rgyud de 'phel bar byed do; ;gnod sbyin gar
K12D0767_H0707:9b-12: mkhan mchog gi brtag pa phyi ma las /
K12D0767_H0707:9b-13: yi ge brgyad pa'i las tshogs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o ////
K12D0767_H0707:9b-14: sde dpon chen po yang dag shes /
K12D0767_H0707:9b-15: mi rnams 'bru'i phung po spel bar 'dod pas dpal lha mo bsgrub par bya ste /
K12D0767_H0707:9b-16: lha'i rgyal po lcang lo can gyi pho brang byang
K12D0767_H0707:9b-17: shar na khang pa dam pa gser gyi rgyal mtshan
K12D0767_H0707:9b-18: zhes bya ba na dpal lha mo bzhugs te de
K12D0767_H0707:9b-19: nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal
K12D0767_H0707:9b-20: mtshan gser bzang po la nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting
K12D0767_H0707:9b-21: nge 'dzin zhus nas sbyin bdag chen por gyur to
K12D0767_H0707:9b-22: // bhrum las rin po che'i khang pa mdzes pa'i
K12D0767_H0707:9b-23: dbus su padma dgu'i steng du bum pa dgu bsam
K12D0767_H0707:10a-1: dbus kyi bum pa'i steng du shr'i gyur pa las
K12D0767_H0707:10a-2: lha mo d'ur ba ljang gu'i mdog can rgyan thams
K12D0767_H0707:10a-4: lag pa g-yas na rin po ches mtshan pa'i padma 'dzin pa /
K12D0767_H0707:10a-5: g-yon skyabs sbyin pa'i phyag rgya can no //
K12D0767_H0707:10a-6: de'i phyi rol bum pa brgyad kyi steng du grogs mo brgyad de /
K12D0767_H0707:10a-14: lha mo dbyangs can ma rnams bsam par bya'o //
K12D0767_H0707:10a-15: de dag kyang lang tsho dar la bab cing sgeg
K12D0767_H0707:10a-16: pa'i nyams dang ldan pa gser gyi mdog can bum
K12D0767_H0707:10a-17: pa dang / 'bras kyi snye ma 'dzin pa /
K12D0767_H0707:10a-18: rang gi mdza' bo'i grogs kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba bsam par bya'o //
K12D0767_H0707:10a-19: de rnams kyi snying po mngon par sgrub pa na /
K12D0767_H0707:10a-24: si li si ni mi ni mi /
K12D0767_H0707:10a-27: aom b'a su dha ri nry'ee sv'ah'a /
K12D0767_H0707:10a-30: aom su d'a d'a yee sv'ah'a /
K12D0767_H0707:10a-32: aom su bha dr'a yee sv'ah'a /
K12D0767_H0707:10a-35: aom sa ra sva tyee sv'ah'a /
K12D0767_H0707:10a-36: gnod sbyin de rnams kyi byang chub kyi spyod pa
K12D0767_H0707:10b-0: rlabs po che mngon par sgrub ste @10b sngon du
K12D0767_H0707:10b-1: bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig byas te dpal lha mo'i
K12D0767_H0707:10b-2: mdun du 'bras bu can gyi shing la las sna
K12D0767_H0707:10b-3: tshogs pa'i thab tu til dkar po'i sbyin sreg byas
K12D0767_H0707:10b-4: pa de'i thal ba 'bru'i bang bar gtor na 'bru'i
K12D0767_H0707:10b-5: phung po chen po 'phel bar byed do //
K12D0767_H0707:10b-6: tsandan dkar pos dpal lha mo'i gzugs tshon gang ba byas te rin po che lnga dang /
K12D0767_H0707:10b-8: dar ser pos dril la snyim par bcug ste 'bum
K12D0767_H0707:10b-9: phrag bzlas nas mdzod khang du 'bru'i phung po'i steng
K12D0767_H0707:10b-10: du bzhag nas khyad par can la sbrang rtsi dang
K12D0767_H0707:10b-12: 'o ma'i mchod yon phul la gsol ba btab na 'bru'i phung po chen po 'phel lo //
K12D0767_H0707:10b-13: gnod sbyin gar mkhan mchog gi brtag pa phyi ma las /
K12D0767_H0707:10b-14: dpal lha mos 'bru'i phung po spel pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o ////
K12D0767_H0707:10b-17: gnod sbyin chen po'i sgrub pa bshad par bya ste /
K12D0767_H0707:10b-22: ri rab rnams yongs su gyur pa las lha'i pho
K12D0767_H0707:10b-23: brang du gyur pa ni lcang lo can gyi bkod
K12D0767_H0707:10b-24: pa las rim pa'i 'phar ma bzhi dang ldan pa
K12D0767_H0707:10b-25: ste; dbus su h'um yongs su gyur pa las rdo
K12D0767_H0707:10b-26: rje dang bcas pa'i h'um yongs su gyur pa las
K12D0767_H0707:10b-27: khro bo'i rgyal po gos sngon po can bsam par
K12D0767_H0707:10b-28: bya ba ni zhal brgyad dang /
K12D0767_H0707:11a-2: phyag bcu drug dang ldan pa ste mthing nag byas pa'i gzugs can /
K12D0767_H0707:11a-3: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
K12D0767_H0707:11a-4: zhal brgyad na g-yas ser ba dang /
K12D0767_H0707:11a-8: de'i steng gi zhal gsum ni g-yas dkar ba dang /
K12D0767_H0707:11a-10: autpal sngon po 'dra ba ni dbus ma'i zhal lo //
K12D0767_H0707:11a-11: de'i steng na zhi brgyan dang bcas pa d'ur ba'i mdog can mi bskyod pa dang ldan pa'o //
K12D0767_H0707:11a-12: phyag rnams na rdo rje dang /
K12D0767_H0707:11a-14: glang po che'i mche ba dang /
K12D0767_H0707:11a-19: de dag ni g-yas pa na'o //
K12D0767_H0707:11a-20: g-yon pa rnams ni sdig mdzub dang bcas pa'i snod chen po dang /
K12D0767_H0707:11a-26: chu shel can gyi steng du gar thabs brgyad kyis
K12D0767_H0707:11a-27: zhabs brdabs pas klu chen po brgyad kyi gdan dang
K12D0767_H0707:11a-28: bcas shing ma lus par 'dar bar bsam mo //
K12D0767_H0707:11a-29: de yi mdun du ngal bso ni //
K12D0767_H0707:11a-30: bee las yang dag rab skyes pa //
K12D0767_H0707:11a-31: seng+ge'i gdan la legs bzhugs shing //
K12D0767_H0707:11b-0: gser @11b mdog rin chen rgyan gyis spras //
K12D0767_H0707:11b-1: g-yas pa rin chen rgyal mtshan te //
K12D0767_H0707:11b-2: g-yon pa sku gdung rab bsnams shing //
K12D0767_H0707:11b-4: gdug pa sreg mdzad dbus nyid na //
K12D0767_H0707:11b-5: rang gi rigs kyi bdag po dang //
K12D0767_H0707:11b-6: gnyis med ye shes las grub bzhugs //
K12D0767_H0707:11b-7: gnod sbyin bye ba'i tshogs bcas rnams //
K12D0767_H0707:11b-8: rang gi 'khor du rnam par bsam //
K12D0767_H0707:11b-9: mdun du dzambha la gser gyi mdog can ne'u le dang /
K12D0767_H0707:11b-10: rin po che 'bar ba bsnams pa'o //
K12D0767_H0707:11b-11: g-yas phyogs su gang ba bzang po gser gyi mdog can ne'u le dang /
K12D0767_H0707:11b-13: rgyab tu nor bu bzang po dkar po ne'u le dang /
K12D0767_H0707:11b-14: rin po che'i snye ma bsnams pa'o //
K12D0767_H0707:11b-15: g-yon du rta bdag ku pe ra mdog nag po ne'u le dang /
K12D0767_H0707:11b-17: yang dag shes ser po ne'u le dang /
K12D0767_H0707:11b-18: rin po che'i gri bsnams pa'o //
K12D0767_H0707:11b-19: 'brog gnas nag po ste ne'u le dang /
K12D0767_H0707:11b-20: rin po che'i mdung bsnams pa'o //
K12D0767_H0707:11b-21: panytsi ka ser skya la ne'u le dang /
K12D0767_H0707:11b-22: khang pa brtsegs pa bsnams pa'o //
K12D0767_H0707:11b-23: rol pa 'khyil pa ni mdog dkar po ste ne'u le dang /
K12D0767_H0707:11b-25: de dag rnams ni rta'i steng na gnas shing rig pa 'dzin pa'i dgos pa sgrub pa'o //
K12D0767_H0707:12a-0: 'phar ma gsum par ni sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad bsam @12a *//
K12D0767_H0707:12a-4: ser skya ste shar phyogs na gnas pa'o //
K12D0767_H0707:12a-8: dga' bo ste lho phyogs na gnas pa'o //
K12D0767_H0707:12a-12: ser skya ste nub phyogs na gnas pa'o //
K12D0767_H0707:12a-16: khyab 'jug ste byang phyogs na gnas pa'o //
K12D0767_H0707:12a-17: byang shar na lnga spyod dang /
K12D0767_H0707:12a-18: shar lho na tshig lnga ser po dang /
K12D0767_H0707:12a-19: lho nub na ri mnyam dang /
K12D0767_H0707:12a-20: byang nub na gser can te de rnams ni nor bu'i rigs so //
K12D0767_H0707:12a-21: yang shar phyogs nas pa dang /
K12D0767_H0707:12a-22: lho phyogs na shin tu sa pa dang /
K12D0767_H0707:12a-23: nub phyogs na nag po dang /
K12D0767_H0707:12a-24: byang phyogs na nye nag ste de dag ni ba glang gi rigs so //
K12D0767_H0707:12a-25: byang shar na nyi ma dang /
K12D0767_H0707:12a-26: shar lho na zla ba dang /
K12D0767_H0707:12a-28: byang nub na rlung ste de dag ni ba glang gi rigs so //
K12D0767_H0707:12a-29: sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag ni gri dang /
K12D0767_H0707:12a-31: mdog dmar nag cung zad khros pa'o //
K12D0767_H0707:12a-32: yang de'i phyi rim du stobs can sum cu rtsa gnyis bsam pa; dbang po dang /
K12D0767_H0707:12b-0: 'dod pa'i gtso bo ste shar phyogs na @12b gnas so //
K12D0767_H0707:12b-8: ri mnyam ste lho phyogs na gnas pa'o //
K12D0767_H0707:12b-16: rgyal ba'i khyu mchog ste nub phyogs na gnas pa'o //
K12D0767_H0707:12b-20: dri za sna tshogs ste 'bras bu gsum pa dang /
K12D0767_H0707:12b-23: lha las byung ba'i ma ldan te byang phyogs na gnas pa'o //
K12D0767_H0707:12b-24: de dag ni sa ga'i rigs te ngal bso ba po rgyal po'i dmag dpon no //
K12D0767_H0707:12b-25: stobs chen sum cu rtsa gnyis bsam pa ni /
K12D0767_H0707:12b-26: mdog ljang nag go cha dang bcas shing mdung dang /
K12D0767_H0707:12b-28: de'i phyi rol tu gnod sbyin dang /
K12D0767_H0707:12b-30: srin po'i tshogs dpag tu med pa bsam pa'o //
K12D0767_H0707:12b-31: de ltar gnod sbyin gyi tshogs chen po rnams bsams te rig pa'i sngags brjod pa ni /
K12D0767_H0707:12b-32: sangs rgyas gang+g'a'i bye snyed kyis //
K12D0767_H0707:12b-33: rjes su gnang ba'i rig pa'i mchog /
K12D0767_H0707:12b-34: sngar med phyis kyang mi 'byung la //
K12D0767_H0707:12b-35: 'di ma gtogs pa'i rig pa ni //
K12D0767_H0707:12b-36: gzhan dag snying po med rtsvar mtshungs //
K12D0767_H0707:13a-1: bho bho pan n'a ga aa dhi pa ta ye /
K12D0767_H0707:13a-2: phu phu ha ra ha ra n'a g'a n'am/
K12D0767_H0707:13a-3: phu phu pra ha ra n'a g'a n'am/
K12D0767_H0707:13a-4: phu phu tshinda tshinda n'a ga hri da y'a ni /
K12D0767_H0707:13a-5: phu phu bhindha bhindha n'a ga d'a ma ni /
K12D0767_H0707:13a-6: bi si ma mandha n'a ga sha r'i ra ni /
K12D0767_H0707:13a-8: n'a ga na ya n'a ni /
K12D0767_H0707:13a-14: bi n'a sha ka r'a ya /
K12D0767_H0707:13a-15: sarba sha trum sam gha bi n'a sha ka r'a ya phat/
K12D0767_H0707:13a-16: aom n'i l'a mba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0767_H0707:13a-17: de ltar bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i rig pas mnyes par byas la klu dang /
K12D0767_H0707:13a-19: 'bar ba'i tshogs rnams yang dag par zhi bar byed pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rjes su gnang ba'o //
K12D0767_H0707:13a-20: de ltar rig pa'i mchog 'di sgrub pa'i rig pa 'dzin pas ni ji ltar 'dod pa sgrub po //
K12D0767_H0707:13a-21: gsang ba'i bdag pos yang gsungs pa //
K12D0767_H0707:13a-22: ngal bso dge ba'i stobs po che //
K12D0767_H0707:13a-23: gsang sngags rgyal po rmad du byung //
K12D0767_H0707:13a-24: lha rnams kun gyi dmag dpon mchog /
K12D0767_H0707:13a-25: de yi rig pa'i sngags bshad pa //
K12D0767_H0707:13a-26: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0767_H0707:13a-27: na mo bee shra ba n'a ya /
K12D0767_H0707:13a-30: aom si mi si mi; su mu su mu /
K12D0767_H0707:13b-0: aan dha ra @13b dh'a tu sv'ah'a /
K12D0767_H0707:13b-1: na mo bee shra ba n'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0767_H0707:13b-3: ma no ra tha pa ri p'u r'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0767_H0707:13b-4: sde dpon yang dag shes rig pa'i rgyal po 'dod
K12D0767_H0707:13b-5: pa'i don thams cad ma bsgrims par 'byung ste sangs
K12D0767_H0707:13b-6: rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su gnang ba'o //
K12D0767_H0707:13b-7: gzhan yang bsam pa rdzogs byed pa'i //
K12D0767_H0707:13b-8: 'gro ba'i rgud pa sel mdzad pa'i //
K12D0767_H0707:13b-9: rin chen gter mdzod chen po ni //
K12D0767_H0707:13b-10: nga yis rab tu bshad par bya //
K12D0767_H0707:13b-11: aom bee shra ba n'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0767_H0707:13b-12: aom dzambha la dza lendra ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0767_H0707:13b-13: aom purna bha dr'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0767_H0707:13b-14: aom ma ni bha dr'a ya sv'ah'a; aom ku be r'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0767_H0707:13b-15: aom sam pradzny'a n'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0767_H0707:13b-16: aom gu hya dha n'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0767_H0707:13b-18: aom tsi pi kunda li ye sv'ah'a /
K12D0767_H0707:13b-19: rig pa'i sngags 'di ni mchog ster ba ste lha rgud pa dang /
K12D0767_H0707:13b-20: mi rgud pa rnams kyi don du gsang ba'i bdag pos bshad pa'o //
K12D0767_H0707:13b-21: gnod spyin gar mkhan mchog gi brtag pa phyi ma las /
K12D0767_H0707:13b-22: gnod sbyin gyi tshogs ngal bso po'i dmag gi sde rnams sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o ////
K12D0767_H0707:13b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po
K12D0767_H0707:13b-24: lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba
K12D0767_H0707:13b-27: khyod kyis ngal bso po'i ming gi rnam grangs dang /
K12D0767_H0707:14a-2: dpyad mang pos ma 'ongs pa'i lha rgud pa dang /
K12D0767_H0707:14a-3: mi rgud pa rnams kyi don du ming gi rnam grangs bstan pa'ang legs so //
K12D0767_H0707:14a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12D0767_H0707:14a-5: rdo rje snying po la sogs pa phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K12D0767_H0707:14a-6: sh'a ri'i bu la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams dang /
K12D0767_H0707:14a-9: dga' ba'i dbang po la sogs pa dang /
K12D0767_H0707:14a-13: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste /
K12D0767_H0707:14a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K12D0767_H0707:14a-15: gnod sbyin gar mkhan mchog gi rgyud rdzogs so ////
K12D0767_H0707:14a-16: kha che'i mkhas pa d'a na gupta las /
